bibl.title: Pesynthios of Coptos / Qift (ca. 568-632) and the Rise of the Egyptian Miaphysite Church. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Egyptian Chalcedonians and anti-chalcedonians on the eve of the Arab conquest. - The Pesynthios papyri and their vicissitudes. - The bishop as patron. - Among prelates. - A flying scribe. - From letters to networks.

bibl.title: Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes

bibl.seg: van der Vliet Jacques, Pesynthios of Coptos / Qift (ca. 568-632) and the Rise of the Egyptian Miaphysite Church. Avec résumé en anglais.
Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes 3-4 (2012) pp. 43-54, 1 fig.

Introduction. - Egyptian Chalcedonians and anti-chalcedonians on the eve of the Arab conquest. - The Pesynthios papyri and their vicissitudes. - The bishop as patron. - Among prelates. - A flying scribe. - From letters to networks.
